episodes.title: Critical Conversations 11.17.23 - The Basics of Cult Recovery
episodes.description:
Tonight we are talking about the basic principles and goals of cult recovery. What are realistic expectations? What is it we are trying to do in dealing with a cult experience? Join us at 6pm MST/8pm EST tonight, call-in and be part of the conversation. See you there!

episodes.title: Scientology Indoctrination 101 - Part 2
episodes.description:
This week Jon Atack and I are continuing our review of the Scientology C/S-1, a step every Scientologist who gets mainline auditing does to prepare them for it. I think you'll see how this indoctrination is crucial to putting people into a mindset where Scientology will then "work." See you at 1pm MT/3pm ET on Sunday, November 12.

episodes.title: How to take back control from a cult
episodes.description: Recovering from a cult or other high control group isn't easy. Today I am live streaming with former Scientologist Jeff Beaumont to discuss different aspects of cult recovery that we used and other potential options for people trying to move on from a coercive situation.

episodes.title: Scientology Indoctrination 101
episodes.description:
In the place of my usual Critical Q&A this week, I am doing a special live stream with Jon Atack to go over some specific points of how indoctrination works in cults and specifically in Scientology with something we'll cover called the Scientology C/S-1. See you at 1pm MT/3pm ET on Sunday, Oct 15.

episodes.title: The Scientology Experience: Shane Weightman (Part 5)
episodes.description:
In order to provide more points of view and experience on my channel, I'm interviewing people involved in Scientology and other destructive cults and getting their stories.  This is Part 5 of Shane Weightman's story, a 2nd generation Scientologist from Europe who was on staff at the Church of Scientology of London.

Scientology: A to Xenu, is available here:
Createspace (paperback): https://goo.gl/yYIl2t
On Amazon: http://goo.gl/K51ySi

Subscribe to my podcast at http://sensiblyspeaking.com or on iTunes at https://goo.gl/1QDUHS

For more information and articles from me, check out my blog at http://mncriticalthinking.com

Please consider supporting this channel and helping me to offer more and better content. 
Patreon: http://patreon.com/chrisshelton
Click the blue Support button here: https://goo.gl/vHgSoE
